channel.title: Offical leaving and start of a new server
channel.description:
T X Offical leave and a reborn of a new server
Well its came To the time for me to get a job. ill be leaving for 4 mouths or so and hoping to save 100 pounds per 2 weeks to come back to on my come back to Private servers (hoping to save 1200 pounds around 2100 USD) things ill be doing while working and when i come back
101% cooking (with interfaces cook x)[IMG]http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u116/the_owner2007/wewt.jpg[/img] Fletching 100% Wcin like Runescape Smithing Full Range Crafting interfaces A brand new client Hoping 460+ by the time i come back A new skill most probly Drug dealing or Drinking Full RuneCrafting Fishing with movable fishing spots Full pk skull system Around 5 new Quests if a 460+ client is out Nearly Full hunting
Things ill buy A new DEDI server hoster :) New forums and site hoster And mayb some other secret stuff ;)
65% of my server is alrdy done but when im back ill be beta than eva! :)
